name: Real Gorilla vs Zombies - City
description:
In this game you are a huge Gorilla trying to rescue people in the big city full of zombies !

Search and rescue cars around in the city - you just need to kill zombies around the car to let it drive away. Be fast and follow the help-arrow to complete missions asap.

Key Features:

- A big real-like city
- Lot of zombies
- Awesome ambiance with lot of zombie sounds
